name: Tropical Green Juice
description: Sweet, mellow, and oh so tropical-tasting. If you closed your eyes while drinking this juice, you just might be on a beach in Hawaii, where the palm trees are bright green and the juice is not.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh pineapple juice from about 1/3 medium pineapple, peeled
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh spinach juice from about 8 ounces fresh spinach
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh mango juice from about 1 large mango, peeled and pitted
2 tablespoons (1 ounce) fresh lime juice from 1 to 2 limes, peeled

recipeInstructions.text: Stir juices together thoroughly, divide between two glasses, and serve immediately.
